name: xicons
description: SVG Vue components integrated from [`fluentui-system-icons`](https://github.com/microsoft/fluentui-system-icons) and [`ionicons`](https://github.com/ionic-team/ionicons).

scripts.build: npm run clean && node scripts/generate.js && npm run format
scripts.build:site: npm run build:for-site && esbuild demo/index.js --bundle --splitting --minify --outdir=site --format=esm --define:process.env.NODE_ENV='"production"' && cp index.html site/index.html
scripts.build:vercel: npm run init && npm run build:site

author: 07akioni
